mapper.select: SELECT id, pw, name, birth, gender_cd, email, phone, zip_cd, addr, addr_detail, use_yn, user_gbn_cd FROM tbl_user a WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT id, pw, name, use_yn, user_gbn_cd FROM tbl_user WHERE id = #{id} AND use_yn = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_user ( id, pw, name, birth, gender_cd, email, phone, zip_cd, addr, addr_detail, use_yn, user_gbn_cd ) VALUES ( #{user.id}, #{user.pw}, #{user.name}, #{user.birth}, #{user.genderCd}, #{user.email}, #{user.phone}, #{user.zipCd}, #{user.addr}, #{user.addrDetail}, #{user.useYn}, #{user.userGbnCd} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_user SET pw = #{user.pw}, name = #{user.name}, birth = #{user.birth}, gender_cd = #{user.genderCd}, email = #{user.email}, phone = #{user.phone}, zip_cd = #{user.zipCd}, addr = #{user.addr}, addr_detail = #{user.addrDetail}, use_yn = #{user.useYn}, user_gbn_cd = #{user.userGbnCd} WHERE id = #{user.id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.job_notice_num, a.job_notice_title, a.job_notice_area, a.job_notice_career_gbn_cd, b.cd_nm AS 'job_notice_career_gbn_nm', DATEDIFF(NOW(), a.job_notice_end_date) AS left_dt, IFNULL(c.file_new_name, '') AS file_new_name , IFNULL(c.file_old_name, '') AS file_old_name , IFNULL(c.file_ext, '') AS file_ext , IFNULL(c.file_url, '') AS file_url, IF(e.target IS NULL, 0, 1) AS likeYn, d.name FROM tbl_job_notice a LEFT JOIN tbl_codeinfo b ON a.job_notice_career_gbn_cd = b.cd AND b.up_cd = 'job_notice_career_gbn_cd' LEFT JOIN tbl_file c ON a.job_notice_num = c.file_ref_id AND c.file_gbn_cd = '40' LEFT JOIN tbl_user d ON a.inst_id = d.id LEFT JOIN tbl_like e ON e.target = a.job_notice_num AND e.like_gbn_cd = '30' AND e.inst_id = #{id} WHERE a.job_notice_end_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND d.use_yn = 'Y' GROUP BY a.job_notice_num ORDER BY a.v_cnt DESC, a.job_notice_num LIMIT 16

SELECT b.job_notice_num, b.job_notice_title, b.job_notice_area, b.job_notice_career_gbn_cd, c.cd_nm AS 'job_notice_career_gbn_nm', DATEDIFF(NOW(), b.job_notice_end_date) AS left_dt, IFNULL(d.file_new_name, '') AS file_new_name, IFNULL(d.file_old_name, '') AS file_old_name, IFNULL(d.file_ext, '') AS file_ext, IFNULL(d.file_url, '') AS file_url, IF(f.target IS NULL, 0, 1) AS likeYn, e.name FROM tbl_like a LEFT JOIN tbl_job_notice b ON a.target = b.inst_id LEFT JOIN tbl_codeinfo c ON b.job_notice_career_gbn_cd = c.cd AND c.up_cd = 'job_notice_career_gbn_cd' LEFT JOIN tbl_file d ON b.job_notice_num = d.file_ref_id AND d.file_gbn_cd = '40' LEFT JOIN tbl_user e ON b.inst_id = e.id LEFT JOIN tbl_like f ON f.target = b.job_notice_num AND f.like_gbn_cd = '30' AND f.inst_id = #{id} WHERE a.inst_id = #{id} AND b.job_notice_end_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND e.use_yn = 'Y' GROUP BY b.job_notice_num ORDER BY DATEDIFF(NOW(), b.job_notice_end_date) DESC LIMIT 16;

SELECT a.job_notice_num, a.job_notice_title, a.job_notice_area, a.job_notice_career_gbn_cd, b.cd_nm AS 'job_notice_career_gbn_nm', DATEDIFF(NOW(), a.job_notice_end_date) AS left_dt, IFNULL(c.file_new_name, '') AS file_new_name, IFNULL(c.file_old_name, '') AS file_old_name, IFNULL(c.file_ext, '') AS file_ext, IFNULL(c.file_url, '') AS file_url, IF(e.target IS NULL, 0, 1) AS likeYn, d.name FROM tbl_job_notice a LEFT JOIN tbl_codeinfo b ON a.job_notice_career_gbn_cd = b.cd AND b.up_cd = 'job_notice_career_gbn_cd' LEFT JOIN tbl_file c ON a.job_notice_num = c.file_ref_id AND c.file_gbn_cd = '40' LEFT JOIN tbl_user d ON a.inst_id = d.id LEFT JOIN tbl_like e ON e.target = a.job_notice_num AND e.like_gbn_cd = '30' AND e.inst_id = #{id} WHERE a.job_notice_end_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 1 DAY) AND DATEDIFF(NOW(), a.job_notice_end_date) > -7 AND d.use_yn = 'Y' GROUP BY a.job_notice_num ORDER BY DATEDIFF(NOW(), a.job_notice_end_date) DESC LIMIT 16;
